Passives.Name: Elusive

Passives.Text: When attacking enemies that have no allies within Range 3, deal double damage.

Passives.Name: Finish the job
Passives.Text: Reaction - you are defeated. Range 3 - Strike-4. Inflict {TIR*2} Poison.

Archetypes.Name: Phantom
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} damage. Consume Dark - inflict {TIR+1} Bleed.

Passives.Name: Like the wind
Passives.Text: Reaction - you are attacked. Consume Air - Teleport 3. Ignore all efects of the triggering attack.

Archetypes.Name: Patient
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. And ally within Range 3 gains 1 Wary.

Passives.Name: The long fight
Passives.Text: Whenever your evasive is triggered, inflict {TIR} Poison to the attacker.

Actions.Name: Close

If Air was consumed, choose an enemy within Range 3 of the target and deal {1} Air damage. {2} Then move to any space within Range 2 of the second target. If Light was consumed, you and an ally within Range 2 gain {3} Barrier and reduce any number of conditions on both of you by 2.
